df-rnghom
blocks.content: Define the set of ring homomorphisms from ` r ` to ` s ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)

axiom df-rnghom(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {

  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s6)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)

  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffss(s1, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)

  -| diffss(s5, s6)
}

axiom df-rnghom(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {
  ‚ä¢ RingHom =(s0 ‚àà Ring, s1 ‚àà Ring ‚Ü¶[(Base ` s0)/ s2][(Base ` s1)/ s3]{ s4 ‚àà(s3[‚Ü¶]s2)|((s4 `(1r ` s0))=(1r ` s1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s5 ‚àà s2, ‚àÄ(s6 ‚àà s2,((s4 `(s5[(+ ` s0)]s6))=((s4 ` s5)[(+ ` s1)](s4 ` s6))‚àß(s4 `(s5[(√ó ` s0)]s6))=((s4 ` s5)[(√ó ` s1)](s4 ` s6))))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s6)
  ‚ä£ d(s5, s6)
}

blocks.name: df-ric
blocks.content: Define the ring isomorphism relation, analogous to ~ df-gic : Two (unital) rings are said to be _isomorphic_ iff they are connected by at least one isomorphism. Isomorphic rings share all global ring properties, but to relate local properties requires knowledge of a specific isomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 24-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: rhmrcl1
blocks.content: Reverse closure of a ring homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: rhmrcl2
blocks.content: Reverse closure of a ring homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: isrhm
blocks.content: A function is a ring homomorphism iff it preserves both addition and multiplication. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)

} = {
  biadanii(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, crg)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmhm, c4))))

  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c1, crg, c2, crg, crh, cin(co(c1, cghm, c2), co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2))), cin(co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)))))

blocks.name: rhmmhm
blocks.content: A ring homomorphism is a homomorphism of multiplicative monoids. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)

thm rhmmul(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {

  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmulr, c2))
} = {
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5))), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2))))
  rhmmhm(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2))
  mhmlin(c0, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2), c3, c4, c5, c6, c7)
  mgpbas(c4, cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  mgpplusg(c6, cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  mgpplusg(c7, cfv(cmgp, c2), c2)

}

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c4)= c5)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(c0 `(s0[c6]s1))=((c0 ` s0)[c7](c0 ` s1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl21anbrc(w0, c0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c2), c1 ‚àà Ring, c2 ‚àà Ring, (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß c0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c2))))
  jca(w0, c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c2)))
  syl21anbrc(w0, c0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c2)), (mulGrp ` c1)‚àà Mnd, (mulGrp ` c2)‚àà Mnd, ((c0 : c3 ‚Üí(Base ` c2))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(c0 `(s0[c6]s1))=((c0 ` s0)[c7](c0 ` s1))))‚àß(c0 `(0 `(mulGrp ` c1)))=(0 `(mulGrp ` c2))))
  syl(w0, (mulGrp ` c1)‚àà Mnd, c1 ‚àà Ring)
  ringmgp(c1, (mulGrp ` c1))
  syl(w0, (mulGrp ` c2)‚àà Mnd, c2 ‚àà Ring)
  ringmgp(c2, (mulGrp ` c2))
  3jca(w0, (c0 : c3 ‚Üí(Base ` c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,(c0 `(s0[c6]s1))=((c0 ` s0)[c7](c0 ` s1)))), (c0 `(0 `(mulGrp ` c1)))=(0 `(mulGrp ` c2)))
  syl(w0, (c0 : c3 ‚Üí(Base ` c2)), c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  ghmf(c0, c1, c2, c3, (Base ` c2))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c3, c3, w0, (c0 `(s0[c6]s1))=((c0 ` s0)[c7](c0 ` s1)))
  3eqtr3g((c0 `(0 `(mulGrp ` c1))), (0 `(mulGrp ` c2)), (c0 ` c4), c5, w0)
  fveq2i(c0, c4, (0 `(mulGrp ` c1)))
  ringidval(c4, (mulGrp ` c1), c1)
  ringidval(c5, (mulGrp ` c2), c2)
  ismhm(s0, s1, c0, (mulGrp ` c1), (mulGrp ` c2), c3, (Base ` c2), c6, c7, (0 `(mulGrp ` c1)), (0 `(mulGrp ` c2)))
  mgpbas(c3, (mulGrp ` c1), c1)
  mgpbas((Base ` c2), (mulGrp ` c2), c2)
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  mgpplusg(c6, (mulGrp ` c1), c1)
  mgpplusg(c7, (mulGrp ` c2), c2)
  eqid((0 `(mulGrp ` c1)))
  eqid((0 `(mulGrp ` c2)))
  isrhm(c0, c1, c2, (mulGrp ` c1), (mulGrp ` c2))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c1))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c2)
  diff.cmgp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c2)
  diff.cmgp.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: isrhmd
blocks.content: Demonstration of ring homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isrhmd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cur, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cur, c2))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmulr, c1))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmulr, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c4), c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c7, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(cplusg, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, c8))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c9, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c10, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c10)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c10)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c9)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  isrhm2d(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  isghmd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c8, c9, c10, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, crg))
  ringgrp(c1)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c2, crg))
  ringgrp(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isrhmd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(1r ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(1r ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(√ó ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(√ó ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c4)= c5)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(c0 `(s0[c6]s1))=((c0 ` s0)[c7](c0 ` s1)))
  ‚ä£ c8 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c9 =(+ ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c10 =(+ ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c3 ‚Üí c8))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(c0 `(s0[c9]s1))=((c0 ` s0)[c10](c0 ` s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c10)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c8)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c9)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c10)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c8)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c9)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  isrhm2d(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  isghmd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c8, c9, c10, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà Ring)
  ringgrp(c1)
  syl(w0, c2 ‚àà Grp, c2 ‚àà Ring)
  ringgrp(c2)
}

blocks.name: rhm1
blocks.content: Ring homomorphisms are required to fix 1. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rhm1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cur, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cur, c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(c0, c3), c4, cfv(c0, cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c1))), cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c1))), cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c2))), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2))))
  rhmmhm(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2))
  mhm0(c0, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2), cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c2)))
  fveq2i(c0, c3, cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c1)))
  ringidval(c3, cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  ringidval(c4, cfv(cmgp, c2), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c2))
}

thm rhm1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c2)‚Üí(c0 ` c3)= c4)

blocks.name: idrhm
blocks.content: The identity homomorphism on a ring. (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm idrhm(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, crh, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
} = {
  syl21anbrc(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, crh, c0)), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c0, crg), wa(wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, cghm, c0)), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c0)))))
  id(wcel(c0, crg))
  jca(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, cghm, c0)), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, cghm, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ringgrp(c0)
  idghm(c0, c1)
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c0))), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmnd))
  ringmgp(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  idmhm(cfv(cmgp, c0), c1)
  mgpbas(c1, cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  isrhm(cres(cid, c1), c0, c0, cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
}

blocks.name: rhmf1o
blocks.content: A ring homomorphism is bijective iff its converse is also a ring homomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 22-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rhmf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wb(wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, crh, c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  impbida(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, crh, c1)))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, crh, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, crg), wcel(c1, crg)), wa(wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cghm, c1)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(cfv(cmgp, c2), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1)))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wa(wcel(c2, crg), wcel(c1, crg)))
  jca(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(c1, crg))
  rhmrcl2(c0, c1, c2)
  rhmrcl1(c0, c1, c2)
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cghm, c1)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(cfv(cmgp, c2), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cghm, c1)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))
  simpr(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wb(wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cghm, c1)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  rhmghm(c0, c1, c2)
  bicomd(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cghm, c1)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))
  ghmf1o(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(cfv(cmgp, c2), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1))), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2))))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2))))
  f1oeq123d(c0, c3, c4, c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)))
  eqidd(c0, wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1))))
  mgpbas(c3, cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  a1i(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2))))
  mgpbas(c4, cfv(cmgp, c2), c2)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wb(wcel(ccnv(c0), co(cfv(cmgp, c2), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1))), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2)))), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2))))
  rhmmhm(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2))
  bicomd(wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2))), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(cfv(cmgp, c2), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1))), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2))))
  mhmf1o(c0, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2)))
  isrhm(ccnv(c0), c2, c1, cfv(cmgp, c2), cfv(cmgp, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, crh, c1))), wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wfn(c0, c3), wfn(ccnv(c0), c4))
  ffnd(c0, c3, c4, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, crh, c1))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, crh, c1)), wf(c0, c3, c4))
  rhmf(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  ffnd(ccnv(c0), c4, c3, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, crh, c1))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, crh, c1)), wf(ccnv(c0), c4, c3))
  rhmf(ccnv(c0), c2, c1, c4, c3)
  dff1o4(c0, c3, c4)
}

thm rhmf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c2)‚Üí((c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)‚Üî `' c0 ‚àà(c2[RingHom]c1)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c1)

} = {

  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)), `' c0 ‚àà(c2[RingHom]c1), (c2 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring), (`' c0 ‚àà(c2[GrpHom]c1)‚àß `' c0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c2)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c1))))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4), (c2 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring))
  jca(c0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c2), c2 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Ring)

blocks.name: isrim
blocks.content: An isomorphism of rings is a bijective homomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 22-Oct-2019.)

blocks.name: rimf1o
blocks.content: An isomorphism of rings is a bijection. (Contributed by AV, 22-Oct-2019.)

blocks.name: rimrhm
blocks.content: An isomorphism of rings is a homomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 22-Oct-2019.)

blocks.name: rimgim
blocks.content: An isomorphism of rings is an isomorphism of their additive groups. (Contributed by AV, 24-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: rhmco

blocks.name: pwsco2rhm
blocks.content: Left composition with a ring homomorphism yields a ring homomorphism of structure powers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: f1ghm0to0
blocks.content: If a group homomorphism ` F ` is injective, it maps the zero of one group (and only the zero) to the zero of the other group. (Contributed by AV, 24-Oct-2019.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 13-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1ghm0to0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c5), c6), wceq(c5, c7)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c2))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c0g, c1))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3)), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c5), c6), wceq(c5, c7))), wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, c5), c6), wceq(c5, c7))
  sylbird(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, c5), c6), wceq(c5, c7), wceq(cfv(c0, c5), cfv(c0, c7)))
  eqeq2d(cfv(c0, c5), cfv(c0, c7), c6, w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3)))
  syl12anc(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3)), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c5), cfv(c0, c7)), wceq(c5, c7)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3), wcel(c7, c3))
  simp2(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3))
  simp3(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3))

  grpidcl(c1, c7, c3)

  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3)), wceq(c5, c7), wceq(cfv(c0, c5), c6))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(c0, c5), c6, cfv(c0, c7), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c5, c3)), wceq(c5, c7))

  simp2(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4), c5 ‚àà c3)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4), c5 ‚àà c3)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4), c5 ‚àà c3, c7 ‚àà c3)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c7 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà Grp)
  ghmgrp1(c0, c1, c2)
  grpidcl(c1, c7, c3)
  f1veqaeq(c0, c3, c4, c5, c7)
  ex((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)‚àß c5 ‚àà c3), c5 = c7, (c0 ` c5)= c6)
  sylan9eqr((c0 ` c5), c6, (c0 ` c7), (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)‚àß c5 ‚àà c3), c5 = c7)

thm kerf1ghm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚Üí((c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)‚Üî(`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 }))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(0 ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(0 ` c2)
} = {
  impbida(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4), (`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 })
  eqssd((`' c0 " { c5 }), { c6 }, (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)))
  ssrdv(hs0, (`' c0 " { c5 }), { c6 }, (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)))
  syl6ibr((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)), hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 }), hs0 ‚àà { c6 }, hs0 = c6)
  ex((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)), hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 }), hs0 = c6)
  syl21anc(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4))‚àß hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 })), hs0 = c6, (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)), hs0 ‚àà c3, (c0 ` hs0)= c5)
  simpl((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)), hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 }))
  simpld(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4))‚àß hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 })), hs0 ‚àà c3, (c0 ` hs0)‚àà { c5 })
  sylib(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4))‚àß hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 })), (c0 ` hs0)= c5, (c0 ` hs0)‚àà { c5 })
  simprd(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4))‚àß hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 })), (c0 ` hs0)‚àà { c5 }, hs0 ‚àà c3)
  biimpa((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)), hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 }), (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c0 ` hs0)‚àà { c5 }))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)), (hs0 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 })‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c0 ` hs0)‚àà { c5 })), c0[Fn]c3)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4), c0[Fn]c3)
  f1fn(c0, c3, c4)
  elpreima(c0, c3, hs0, { c5 })
  elsn((c0 ` hs0), c5)
  fvex(c0, hs0)
  imp(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3), (c0 ` hs0)= c5, hs0 = c6)
  3expa(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4), hs0 ‚àà c3, ((c0 ` hs0)= c5 ‚Üí hs0 = c6))
  biimpd((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3), (c0 ` hs0)= c5, hs0 = c6)
  f1ghm0to0(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, hs0, c5, c6)
  velsn(hs0, c6)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4), { c6 } ‚äÜ(`' c0 " { c5 }))
  snssd(c6, (`' c0 " { c5 }), c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  mpbir2and(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c6 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 }), c6 ‚àà c3, (c0 ` c6)‚àà { c5 })

  elsn((c0 ` c6), c5)
  fvex(c0, c6)
  3syl(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c6 ‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 })‚Üî(c6 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c0 ` c6)‚àà { c5 })), (c0 : c3 ‚Üí c4), c0[Fn]c3)
  ffn(c0, c3, c4)
  elpreima(c0, c3, c6, { c5 })
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 }), (c0 : c3 ‚Ü£ c4), (c0 : c3 ‚Üí c4), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1))))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 }, (c0 : c3 ‚Üí c4))
  ghmf(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 }), ((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)‚Üí hs0 = hs1))
  ex(((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 })‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  3anassrs(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 }, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß((`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 } ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)‚àß(c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))), hs0 = hs1, (hs0[(-g ` c1)]hs1)= c6)
  sylib((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß((`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 } ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)‚àß(c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))), (hs0[(-g ` c1)]hs1)= c6, (hs0[(-g ` c1)]hs1)‚àà { c6 })
  eleqtrd((hs0[(-g ` c1)]hs1), { c6 }, (`' c0 " { c5 }), (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß((`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 } ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)‚àß(c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))))
  syl31anc((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß((`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 } ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)‚àß(c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))), (hs0[(-g ` c1)]hs1)‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 }), c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3, (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))
  simpr3(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 }, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))
  biimpa((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1), (hs0[(-g ` c1)]hs1)‚àà(`' c0 " { c5 }))
  ghmeqker(c0, c1, c2, hs0, c3, hs1, (-g ` c1), (`' c0 " { c5 }), c5)
  eqid((`' c0 " { c5 }))
  simpr1(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 }, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))
  elsn((hs0[(-g ` c1)]hs1), c6)
  ovex(hs0, (-g ` c1), hs1)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß((`' c0 " { c5 })= { c6 } ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)‚àß(c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))), ((hs0[(-g ` c1)]hs1)= c6 ‚Üî hs0 = hs1), c1 ‚àà Grp, hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3)

  df-ric()
  ax-mp(RingIso[Fn](ùïå √ó ùïå), ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ùïå, { hs0 ‚àà(hs2[RingHom]hs1)| `' hs0 ‚àà(hs1[RingHom]hs2)} ‚àà ùïå)))
  rgen2a(hs2, hs1, universe, { hs0 ‚àà(hs2[RingHom]hs1)| `' hs0 ‚àà(hs1[RingHom]hs2)} ‚àà ùïå)

  ovex(hs2, crh, hs1)
  rabexg(hs0, (hs2[RingHom]hs1), universe, `' hs0 ‚àà(hs1[RingHom]hs2))
  fnmpt2(hs2, hs1, universe, universe, { hs0 ‚àà(hs2[RingHom]hs1)| `' hs0 ‚àà(hs1[RingHom]hs2)}, universe, crs)
  df-rngiso(hs2, hs1, hs0)

blocks.name: brric2
blocks.content: The relation "is isomorphic to" for (unital) rings. This theorem corresponds to the definition ~ df-risc of the ring isomorphism relation in JM's mathbox. (Contributed by AV, 24-Dec-2019.)

thm brric2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cric, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, crs, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(wbr(c0, cric, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, crs, c1)))), wne(co(c0, crs, c1), emptycls), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, crs, c1))))
  brric(c0, c1)
  n0(s0, co(c0, crs, c1))
  pm4.71ri(wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, crs, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)))

  rimrcl(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, crs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, crh, c1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, crh, c0))))
  isrim0(c0, universe, c1, universe, cv(s0))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, crh, c1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, crh, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)))
  simplbi(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, crh, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1)))))
  isrhm(cv(s0), c0, c1, cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, crs, c1)
  diff.crs.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg))

  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, crg)

thm brric2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[~=r]c1 ‚Üî((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring)‚àß ‚àÉ(s0, s0 ‚àà(c0[RingIso]c1))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(c0[~ = r]c1, ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring)‚àß ‚àÉ(s0, s0 ‚àà(c0[RingIso]c1))), (c0[RingIso]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(s0, s0 ‚àà(c0[RingIso]c1)))
  brric(c0, c1)
  n0(s0, (c0[RingIso]c1))
  pm4.71ri(‚àÉ(s0, s0 ‚àà(c0[RingIso]c1)), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring))
  exlimiv(s0, s0 ‚àà(c0[RingIso]c1), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring))
  mpcom(s0 ‚àà(c0[RingIso]c1), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  rimrcl(s0, c0, c1)
  syl6bi((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), s0 ‚àà(c0[RingIso]c1), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring), (s0 ‚àà(c0[RingHom]c1)‚àß `' s0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c0)))
  isrim0(c0, universe, c1, universe, s0)
  adantr(s0 ‚àà(c0[RingHom]c1), `' s0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c0), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring))
  simplbi(s0 ‚àà(c0[RingHom]c1), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring), (s0 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)‚àß s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c1))))
  isrhm(s0, c0, c1, (mulGrp ` c0), (mulGrp ` c1))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c0))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, crs, c1)

blocks.name: ricgic
blocks.content: If two rings are (ring) isomorphic, their additive groups are (group) isomorphic. (Contributed by AV, 24-Dec-2019.)
